select rtr.IDC_ID, rtr.ROOM_IDX, max(rtr.LOG_FLAG) as LOG_FLAG, max(rtr.STAT_YEAR) as STAT_YEAR, max(rtr.STAT_MONTH) as STAT_MONTH, max(rtr.STAT_DATE) as STAT_DATE, SUM(rtr.LOG_COUNT) as LOG_COUNT, max(sii.IDC_NAME) as TRANS_IDC_ID, max(ssr.ROOM_NAME) as TRANS_ROOM_IDX from SMMS_RPT_RECORD rtr left join SMMS_ROOM_INFO as ssr on rtr.ROOM_IDX = ssr.ROOM_IDX and rtr.IDC_ID = ssr.ACCESS_ID left join smms_idc_info as sii on rtr.IDC_ID = sii.IDC_ID
rtr.RECORDSTATE='0'
${whereCondition}

GROUP BY rtr.STAT_YEAR,rtr.STAT_MONTH,rtr.IDC_ID,rtr.ROOM_IDX
GROUP BY rtr.STAT_YEAR,rtr.IDC_ID,rtr.ROOM_IDX
order by ${order}
